description:
Pal Contact gets you quickly in contact with friends and acquaintances using mobile, landline phone, email or SMS options. 

Pal Contact helps you not to miss birthdays. It reminds you on upcoming birthdays. You can also sort your contacts by who's birthday is next to come.


It is designed for easy and fast access. No big setup or configuration required. All you need is only two taps to contact your friends.

Your friends are automatically sorted by the frequency you get in contact with them  (based on the last 10 days). Of course your contacts can be arranged in an alphabetic order as well.



Pal Contact provides the following functions:


- reminds your on your friends' birthdays each day at first usage. Either several days in advance as well as at the birthday itself

- provides large pictures so there is no need for pinpointing at small targets

- provides filtering function. Just type a few letters and Pal Contact will filter your contact list accordingly

- auto dial (don't have to press that green button of the phone app by yourself)

- close after dial

- 3 nice and bright skins (wood, paper and orange)

- shows the birthdays of your contacts

- avoids unnecessary complexity to keep the usage as intuitively as possible



Your contacts can be sorted in any of the following ways:


- by firstname or lastname

- from youngest to oldest (might be an interesting point of view)

- by the next birthday

- by how frequent you get in contact with someone. A person you contact most often will automatically "bubble up" in the list


To evaluate it, download Pal Contact LITE and give it a try.
